Netherworld_Tentacles.help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their chance to hit. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Netherworld_Tentacles.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Minor DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly
Netherworld_Tentacles.targetHelp: The Living Shadows are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Smite.help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals more damage than Shadow Punch, but has a longer recharge time. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Smite.targetHelp: The Smite has reduced your chance to hit.

Netherworld_Grasp.help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to summon dark tentacles to render your target helpless and inflicting moderate negative energy damage. Even if the target is powerful enough to resist the power's hold effect they will have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Netherworld_Grasp.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit
Netherworld_Grasp.targetHelp: The Penumbral Grasp has stopped you in your tracks!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Engulfing_Darkness.help: You release a burst of negative energy to foes around you dealing moderate Negative Energy damage, reducing their chance to hit and sapping their health over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Engulfing_Darkness.shortHelp: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)
Engulfing_Darkness.targetHelp: The Engulfing Darkness is causing minor Negative Energy over time and reducing your chance to hit!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Darkest_Night.help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Moderate
Darkest_Night.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and Damage potential are reduced by the darkness.
Darkest_Night.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest} and all foes nearby.
Darkest_Night.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage and chance to hit with their {PowerName}.
